After a week in Barcelona, finally found the BEST tapas bar that includes the ambiance I always expected-  the challenge in Barcelona is finding a tapas place that is not so over-salty that the flavors sort of all taste the same:  salty!  La Alcoba Azul is fantastic- and tucked away on a quaint side-street that can be hard to find, but way worth the effort.  And the staff are tremendous, funny, and so very fun to just see them enjoy their work (especially Carmen- very friendly and super helpful!)-  best dish of the night was the stuffed red pepper with cheese (sorry, forget the name) that just melts in your mouth and flavor-punch with every bite.  Lots of locals with a smattering of foreigners and always appears busy.  We will be back!
